name: Go Little Rockstar
description:
Perhaps the first of its kind Rhythm RPG-like Musician Life Social Simulation Game About

Go Little Rockstar is a rhythm RPG-like musician-life social simulation game with a character distribution gacha system. Each has a unique character, storyline and musical talent.

What's the fun about playing?

Did you ever dream about starting a rock band? The musician's path to popularity and star status is through the thorns of street performances, hours of rehearsals and creative torment. Try taking on the role of frontman of a music band, performing on the streets of a multi-faceted city, earning popularity and making your way to stadiums full of fans.

Game features:
  • The atmosphere of a megalopolis strangely intermingles the architecture of the French capital and Japanese culture.
  • The styling solution - y2k - will make the adult audience nostalgic and acquaint them with the aesthetics of subcultures of the beginning of the 21st century, those who were born in the Zero.
  • There are lots of NPC characters with a variety of personalities and skills. In your own way, you can help the characters to make their dreams a reality.
  • Form a repertoire of songs, tune up your musical instruments and bring together the star musicians of your rock group.
  • The Open World of the game and Open Final Play.
Our vision

With GoLittleRockstar’s debut game, GLR team is redefining stereotypical game mechanics to create a new perspective on gacha systems, RPG and rhythm games. Fresh breath for fans of these genres and developing Gamedev in general.
